[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Edge case] [Genesis state] During genesis, when state is empty, does get_account_sequence_number() handle missing AccountResources correctly? (Medium)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [DoS] [Lock contention] Can an attacker submit transactions that take very long to validate, holding locks and preventing other transactions from being validated? (High)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [DoS] [Cache thrashing] Can an attacker submit transactions that cause continuous cache invalidation forcing expensive reset_all() calls? (Medium)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [DoS] [Panic flooding] Can an attacker flood validators with transactions that consistently panic, causing all pool members to have poisoned mutexes? (High)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Integration] [Mempool coordination] How does VMValidator coordinate with mempool - can accepted transactions be removed from mempool before commit causing revalidation? (Medium)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Integration] [Consensus integration] If validation and consensus disagree on transaction validity, which takes precedence, and can this cause safety violations? (Critical)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Dependencies] [Version skew] Can mismatched versions of aptos_vm, aptos_types, or aptos_storage_interface cause validation inconsistencies? (High)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Dependencies] [Dependency vulnerabilities] Are all dependencies audited for security issues that could affect transaction validation? (Medium)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Testing] [Unit test coverage] Are all error paths and edge cases in VMValidator covered by unit tests in vm_validator_test.rs? (Low)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Testing] [Concurrency testing] Are there stress tests that validate correct behavior under high concurrent load? (Low)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Race condition] [notify_commit vs validate] Can notify_commit() execute between acquiring validator lock and starting validation, causing wrong state to be used? (Critical)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Race condition] [restart vs validate] Can restart() execute while validate_transaction() is holding a lock, causing inconsistent state views? (High)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Race condition] [Multiple notifies] Can multiple notify_commit() calls race, causing some state updates to be lost? (High)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Memory safety] [Use after free] When VMValidator is dropped while validation is ongoing, can dangling pointers cause use-after-free? (Critical)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Memory safety] [Double free] Can panic during validation cause double-free when unwinding through locks and Arc drops? (High)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Type safety] [Type confusion] Can Move type system bugs cause validation to accept transactions that would fail execution? (Critical)
[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Type safety] [Generic bounds] Are generic type bounds in TransactionValidation trait sufficient to prevent unsound implementations? (Medium)
